name: Miracle Balm
description: A light-reflecting balm that gives your skin a fresh, healthy glow. Functions as highlighter, blush, and bronzer.

name: What The Foundation
description: Light-medium, buildable coverage foundation offering fresh, even complexion results.

description: Lightweight tinted moisturizer that smooths and evens skin tone with hydrating ingredients and non-comedogenic formula.

description: A creamy yet dense concealer that provides buildable coverage for concealing redness and evening skin tone.

description: A sheer, lightweight skin tint that offers a natural suntanned look with a barely there feel.

description: Ultra-lightweight setting powder designed for seamless blending, minimizing shine.

description: Broad spectrum mineral SPF 30 with color-correcting pigments to offset white cast. Non-comedogenic.

name: The Dusty Rose Kit
description: A limited-edition kit featuring a cool, rosy pink color story across face, eyes, and lips. Includes the new exclusive Gel Tint in Dusty Rose, Just A Sec eyeshadow with shimmer, The Lippie Stick in Dusty Rose, and a limited edition snack bag. Tagline: Pretty in Pink.
keyBenefits: Coordinated color story across face, eyes, and lips
Exclusive NEW Gel Tint - creates natural luminosity with sheer, lightweight feel
Multi-use products that simplify your routine
Limited edition with exclusive snack bag
shades: Dusty Rose - cool, rosy pink sheer tint
bestFor: Fair to medium skin tones seeking a fresh, rosy glow

name: The Sunkissed Kit
description: A limited-edition kit featuring a warm, bronzy color story across face, eyes, and lips. Includes the new exclusive Gel Tint in Sunkissed, Just A Sec eyeshadow, The Lippie Stick in Sunkissed, and a limited edition snack bag. Tagline: Pretty in Bronze.
keyBenefits: Coordinated color story across face, eyes, and lips

Multi-use products that simplify your routine
Limited edition with exclusive snack bag
shades: Sunkissed - deep reddish bronze sheer tint
bestFor: Light to dark skin tones seeking warm, bronzy glow

name: The Eyeshadow Stick
description: A creamy, highly pigmented shadow stick that transforms your eye look without trying. Glides on effortlessly and blends with just your fingertip for a seamless, buildable finish.
shades: Cream, Sand, Taupe, Toffee, Smokey Grey, Brown
whyWeLoveIt: One stick, unlimited looks. Whether you want a subtle wash of color or a more dramatic smoky eye, this stick does it all with zero effort. It's the easiest way to elevate your eye look in seconds.
howItsDifferent: The secret is its formulaâ€”creamy enough to glide on smoothly but with enough grip to stay put all day. Unlike powders that can crease or fall out, this stick formula melts into your skin and sets beautifully.
howToUse: Apply directly to eyelids and blend using your fingertip or a brush. Layer for more intensity or use as a base for powder shadows.
whoItsFor: Even if you're someone who doesn't typically wear eyeshadow, this stick makes it foolproof. Perfect for makeup minimalists who want maximum impact with minimal effort.
keyIngredients: Vitamin E, Soybean Oil, Jojoba Esters
finish: Creamy matte to subtle sheen depending on shade
